mapper.select: SELECT a.es_idx, b.or_dte, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') AS years, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM( IFNULL(es_cnt1,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt2,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt3,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt4,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt5,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt6,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt7,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt8,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt9,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt10,0) ) AS orderCnt, SUM(pr_re_cnt) AS prodCnt from sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx JOIN sm_work_order c ON b.or_idx = c.or_idx JOIN sm_prod_result d ON c.wo_idx = d.wo_idx JOIN sm_delivery e ON b.or_idx = e.or_idx WHERE DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY MONTH ORDER BY or_dte

SELECT YEAR(or_date) AS years, MONTH(or_date) AS months, ISNULL(SUM(or_qty), 0)AS order_cnt , day(or_date) AS days , '' AS days FROM sm_orders WHERE YEAR(or_date) = #{searchCondition} AND MONTH(or_date) = #{searchCondition2} GROUP BY YEAR(or_date), MONTH(or_date) , or_date ORDER BY months , or_date

SELECT YEAR(rel_date) AS years, MONTH(rel_date) AS months, ISNULL(SUM(rel_qty), 0)AS prod_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN CONVERT(float, rel_price) >= 0 THEN CONVERT(float, rel_price) ELSE 0 END) AS rel_price , day(rel_date) as rel_day , '' AS rel_day FROM sm_release_info a WHERE YEAR(rel_date) = #{searchCondition} AND MONTH(rel_date) = #{searchCondition2} GROUP BY YEAR(rel_date), MONTH(rel_date) , rel_date ORDER BY months , rel_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y-%m') AS monthly, DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM(or_money)/10000 AS money FROM sm_orders WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') GROUP BY monthly
